divs: Sighting Details11:30 p.m. Sunday nite stepped out for cigarette, while looking up at nite sky and caught this aspirin size to a smaller size pulsating-changing Red to center-clear Orb. Size would change to about eraser-size orb as it trailed out in front of me in sky 20 degrees above horizon till it became overhead 90 degrees, pulsating and changing size till it vanished..right away. No more, gone. Felt a little more energetic after the siting.
Summary: Changing red-orb circle, streaming overhead changes size on heading until overhead then ,dissappears.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Salt Springs
This sighting has never been favorited.
